d_opening: ???: To be honest, I really don't think we should be here...
Ger: I know. Isn't that obvious?
Ger: Oh come on, don't be a scaredy cat.
Ger: Look! The moon is that way. Just a little more and we'll be out from the other side.
Ger: If you don't trust me, that's fine.
d_prologue: ???: Who am I? I don't remember anything!
d_name: ???: Oh right, I'm ???! How could I forget.
???: I remember walking with Ger along the mountain and...
???: Better look around to see what's here
d_die_1: ???: This doesn't look safe.... I could just die.
???: Better to go back to large areas.
d_firstMed: ???: What? A bandage in the middle of nowhere?
???: Well, that's convenient. Let me use it.
: You feel power slowly returning into your body
???: That should slow down the bleeding.
d_usedMed: ???: I've used this before. There's no more bandage to use.
d_huge_cave: ???: What a huge cave... Do someone live here?
d_chest: ???: Looks like a chest. Too bad I don't have the key to open it.
